Dgame.Audio.VorbisFile



alias VorbisFile OggFile;
An alias for VorbisFile

class VorbisFile: Dgame.Audio.SoundFile.BaseSoundFile;
An Ogg/Vorbis implementation of BaseSoundFile Open an ogg/vorbis file and store the attributes from it's headers.

Author:
rschuett

this(string filename);
CTor

const pure nothrow MusicType getType();
Returns the music type. In this case: Ogg.
